item.title: Python and R
item.description: library(reticulate) Introduction R and Python are two different programming languages that can do many similar things. I have mainly worked with R for statistical purposes (like making nice graphs!) and feel like I'm finally getting the hang of it :) Python, on the other hand, remains a mystery (especially regex) but is also immensely useful for statistics and other coding purposes. Reticulate allows you to share things between R and Python.
